ios.sim.dev.debug.build: RN_SRC_EXT=e2e.tsx CHAMBER_OF_SECRETS=true xcodebuild -workspace ios/GoldWallet.xcworkspace -UseNewBuildSystem=NO -scheme "GoldWallet Dev (Release)" -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build -quiet

ios.sim.dev.staging.build: RN_SRC_EXT=e2e.tsx CHAMBER_OF_SECRETS=true xcodebuild -workspace ios/GoldWallet.xcworkspace -UseNewBuildSystem=NO -scheme "GoldWallet Stage (Release)" -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build -quiet

android.emu.prod.debug.build: cd android && RN_SRC_EXT=e2e.tsx CHAMBER_OF_SECRETS=true ./gradlew assembleProdDebug assembleProdDebugAndroidTest -DtestBuildType=debug && cd ..
